document.full_text: connecticut coach jim calhoun is preparing for a charity bicycle ride in june and a trip to the caribbean in july, but said he was not ready to decide on his future past that.
document.title: no decision for calhoun
lines_and_colors: connecticut coach jim calhoun is preparing for a charity bicycle ride in june and a trip to the caribbean in july, but said he was not ready to decide on his future past that.
